metadata.title: CVE-2023-24472 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the FitsOutput::close()functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.7.1. A speciallycrafted ImageOutput Object can lead to denial of service. An attacker canprovide malicious input to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
